title: Trump eyes tariffs on up to $60 billion in Chinese goods
text:
Trump eyes tariffs on up to $60 billion in Chinese goods Wednesday, March 14, 2018 - 01:23 
Sources say U.S. President Donald Trump is seeking to impose tariffs on up to $60 billion of Chinese imports that will target the technology and telecommunications sectors.   
Sources say U.S. President Donald Trump is seeking to impose tariffs on up to $60 billion of Chinese imports that will target the technology and telecommunications sectors.  //reut.rs/2peymlt
